article.title: Archer to Provide Casing Accessories and Cementing Equipment in Asia Pacific
article.text:
Archer, the global oilfield services company, will provide casing accessories and auxiliary cementing equipment for a major Asian operator after receiving a letter of award (LOA) recently.

The scope of work includes the supply of goods to be utilised in connection with exploration and drilling activities offshore Malaysia. With operations starting in H1 2018, the LOA covers a two-year period with a one-year extension option.

Archer will provide the multistage cementing equipment, comprising the Cflex® multistage cementing system, as a part of the application.

Archer’s Cflex® technology enables high-performance multistage cementing. Qualified “gas tight” equivalent to ISO 14998 V0: 2013 and with a permanent lock system, Cflex® performs to the highest integrity standards.
